title: Complementary and Integrative Health: CAM Therapies and Clinical | Course Hero
author: CoachScienceOryx
description: View Week 6 study guide.docx from NUR 227 at University of Kentucky. NUR 321 Week 6 study guide CAM and Integrative Health (note- you do not need to know table 32.1) Complementary and integrative
cleaned_text: NUR 321 Week 6 study guide CAM and Integrative Health (note- you do not need to know table 32.1) Complementary and integrative approaches to health Define holistic nursing:treats the mind-body-spirit of the patient, using therapies and guided imagery Define integrative nursing:defined as "a way of being knowing-doing that advances the health and well-being of persons, families, and communities through caring-healing relationships. Nursing accessible therapies (starting on page 677, for each briefing describe the therapy, clinicalapplications and limitations)
